title: How do people make money from books? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on how the book is published, manufactured and distributed. Most of the time the author will receive royalties from the publisher. This oftentimes proceeds an advance which is determined between them and the publisher. If they are self-published through a platform such as Amazon then they will receive a larger chunk of the royalties but do more of the promotion work. For ambitious folk it is also possible to self-publish paperback, hardcover and audiobook forms of your book through Createspace and ACX.

People make money form books by writing them and selling them. They can also write online books with built in advertising space to other online links and receive ad revenue. Additionally, authors can write books and sell the rights and receive residual income from the distribution of the published works.
